Series III.B. Organizational and Corporate Records
Series III.B. Organizational and Corporate Records

This small subseries is an assembled grouping of organizational and corporate business records. The subseries represents New York City corporate and organizational business concerns through a cash book, ship log, ledger, and receipts. This subseries also consists of organizational records, indentures, policies, memorabilia, and a ship's crew list.
